items.name: Tiger
items.description: The tiger is a large cat and a member of the genus Panthera native to Asia. It has a powerful, muscular body with a large head and paws, a long tail and orange fur with black, mostly vertical stripes.

items.name: Air Jordern1
items.description: The Air Jordan 1 is an iconic basketball shoe first released by Nike in 1985 for Michael Jordan. It was designed by Peter Moore and is known for its distinctive high-top design and various colorways. The shoe gained popularity
